channel.title: Animals on Rick Gilmore's site
channel.description: Recent content in Animals on Rick Gilmore's site

item.title: lonely cicada
item.description: Lonely cicada. Bad at math. Off by one? Damn. No choral singing.

item.title: barnyard diary
item.description: Feeling sheepish? You try wearing wool in July. Ya think I’d chew this stuff if I could smoke it? Hey, lady, let me juice yours. I'm past waiting for some sweet-talking spider to say I'm super. The horse is an ass. Aren't they all? I don't relish rooster's cock 'em who'll do any more than you two. You see, cherie, he crows he wants to do me. If I could sleep in a bed, I wouldn’t roll in the hay.
